name: Trent Wilbanks
text: The last couple of times I have ordered Pizza it has been amazing: perfectly cooked and lots of toppings. I ordered extra toppings and wow! They don‚Äôt skimp on extras anymore. Staff was polite and professional. They have improved 100% in the last few months.

name: Charlotte Robb
text: Never greeted by anyone when we went in. Tables were sticky. Pizza on pizza bar was soggy. Had to use a fork to eat it. It had good flavor but not pizza huts best. Will not eat at this one again.

name: Michelle Brown
text: The pizza was ok but had to pay full price buffet for a 1 year old and a 4 year old.

name: Heather
text: I ordered online, and if u sign up they email you discounts. In made my order with my discounts and the food was awesome. I love the salad bar there as well. Great

name: Marti Van Neste
text: This would be a better review except for the fact that they won't deliver to our address in spite of our address being in city limits. The other Pizza place is further away but will deliver to us. Sometimes Pizza Hut doesn't even have a driver available. Don't advertise delivery options if you won't deliver.

name: katie burks
text: Food is fine but the drama with employees friends isnt worth wasting your lunch hour on the buffet. You should be able to get lunch without comments being made about you to employees loud enough to hear. I work as a licensed Insurance agent in town.

name: Rebecca H
text: Friendly personnel and great service. Pepperoni pizza is my grandchildren's favorite. It's a must when we order.

name: Mark Thoda
text: They cleaned the place up and have a pretty good pizza.

name: Cordarius Murrell
text: A little slow but good eating.

name: Jay Parker
text: Normally good but when I went to place an online order they called me to tell me they couldn't make it then gave me attitude when I wanted to make sure it was canceled and was trying to rush me off the phone

name: Phillip Roberts
text: Long story short, my nephew loves Pizza Hut and wanted to spend his birthday eating with his family at Pizza Hut. We show up and are told we can eat but no birthday activities. This includes opening presents. Mind you that there is no one ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenatta Jones
text: This experience ruined my taste for Pizza Hut which has been a long time family treat. The P'Zone I ordered was actually dry and over cooked. I believe the culprit is just this local place. From now on, if I want Pizza Hut I'll just drive to the next county.

name: Theresa Putt
text: Great fresh food

name: Katrina Wray
text: Good pizza and salad bar

name: B C
text: Fast friendly service

name: Emogene B.
text: Very disappointed in the unprofessional service of the young girl taking orders on Saturday night. When my family called to place an order, she acted as though she was being inconvenienced and bothered. The order was delivered to our hotel ‚Ä¶More

name: Darcey Gehring
text: Was in town for a family members funeral & called from a local hotel we were staying at for delivery service. Spoke with an obviously new & rude employee on the phone. After repeatedly needing help with taking my order & me telling her I ‚Ä¶More

name: Pamela Peeler
text: Tonight Pizza Hut was very delicious. I hope they stay as good as they are tonight.

name: Christine Buccitti
text: service was great and the pizza was just how I ordered it

name: Thomas Burgess
text: Very good service in bolivar Tennessee...

name: Amy Rufus
text: We're so excited that y'all are finally delivering in our area. Now, we can finally eat the pizza we love. We just love Pizza Hutüíùüíù.

name: Pravin Patel
text: Poor customer service and desk people hang up the phone during the order and they have my information to call back but they don't care about customer.

name: Delvakio Brown
text: I can honestly say that in the last couple of months this restaurant is improving.  The food is getting better and choice of employees too! They have a problem of running out of wings but lately they have them when I order.

name: Don Harris
text: Very slow service. Only came to the table to deliver the pizzas. Never came back. Very expensive to dine in versus carryout - $36 versus 2 pizzas for $7.99 - then not get service to boot. Won't be going back.

name: Everlyn Harris
text: My experience was very good.. The pizza was hot an i could actually see yhe extra cheese i paid 4....Great job..

name: Angie Fawcett
text: This is the nastiest place I ever ate. Pizza Hut needs to do something about their Bolivar Tennessee business. Couldn't even use the bathroom because it smelled so much like urine. Tables not clean. Drinking glasses felt greasie.floors filthie. Terrible experience!

name: Jared Deubler
text: About in line with every other Pizzahut I've been too.

name: Lisa Vaughn
text: Good food. Nice friendly people.

name: Warren Sall
text: No service had to serve ourselves including drinks.

name: Monica Owen
text: Service was terrible had to go to counter to order then never was offered a refill nothing

name: Jeffery Robertson
text: Vegetable  pizza is the best to me

name: David Vue
text: Excellent set of staff and an awesome first official job I had. Pizza Hut has prepared me for any future career through dedication, hard work, and teamwork.

name: Debbie Roberson
text: Good food

text: mane pizza hut fye af on baby and they aint scared to deliver 2 the hood i fw em

name: Donna Whitton
text: No service, had to retrieve our own straws, fork, napkins.  Not exactly clean either.

name: Austin Young
text: Never enough pizza out. Do not use hot water in  restroom, scalded my skin whild trying to wash hands.

name: Malik Lloyd
text: Improving staff, food getting better, and enjoyable atmosphere. All they need is better equipment and new building.

name: Daisy Futrell
text: The  food was great  workers  was experience and very friendly

name: Toy Henley
text: Their pizzas are really good. They hsve good specials.

text: Good fresh and hot food. clean facility friendly staff decent price.

text: GOOD FOOD AND SERVICE

name: Gordon Tosh
text: They were fast friendly. And the food was the FANTASTIC

name: David Newman
text:
Kind of friendly, staff could be more welcoming.
However, it has been a while now since I have visited.

text: Pizza hut is a great place to get good pizza

text: I am the new store manager of this pizza hut. Any body who may have had a bad experience at my restaurant please come give it another try . I promise you wont be disappointed

text: including no marinara sauce when we asked for sauce the smart mouth idiot employee said tell them to get it themselves go to dominoes dont come into this place
